folder: Hudson Street & Clarkson Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Hudson Street, east side, from Clarkson to Leroy Sts., showing the old St. Johns Burying Ground. This later became Hudson Park. View 2 shows the far corner at Leroy Street. No. 3 is a modern view showing the foreground corner after the Park was developed here.

No's.l-2: 1898
3:Sept. 4, 1938

J. J. Corell, photo
P. L. Sperr Collection

P. L. Sperr
